ivardefs.name: condition_
ivardefs.desc: The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had. This is a repeating section to allow a system to represent more than one condition per resource, though there is nothing stopping multiple resources - one per condition.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date (and possibly time) when the family member history was taken.

ivardefs.name: definition_
ivardefs.desc: A protocol or questionnaire that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

ivardefs.name: estimatedAge
ivardefs.desc: If true, indicates that the age value specified is an estimated value.

ivardefs.name: gender
ivardefs.desc: Administrative Gender - the gender that the relative is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this family member history record that are defined by business processes and/ or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / pri

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: This will either be a name or a description; e.g. "Aunt Susan", "my cousin with the red hair".

ivardefs.name: notDone
ivardefs.desc: If true, indicates the taking of an individual family member's history did not occur. The notDone element should not be used to document negated conditions, such as a family member that did not have a condition.

ivardefs.name: notDoneReason
ivardefs.desc: Describes why the family member's history is absent.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person. Ideally, the note would be in the condition property, but this is not always possible.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The person who this history concerns.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.

ivardefs.name: relationship
ivardefs.desc: The type of relationship this person has to the patient (father, mother, brother etc.).

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: A code specifying the status of the record of the family history of a specific family member.
